<h3 id="X10039">X(10039)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-YFF AND OUTER-GARCIA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p><b>
X(10039) = (R-r)*X(1)+3*r*X(2)
</b></p>
<p>X(10039) lies on these lines:{1,2}, {3,5252}, {4,5119}, {5,3057}, {11,9956}, {12,517}, {21,5176}, {35,515}, {36,6684}, {40,1478}, {46,388}, {47,5264}, {55,355}, {65,495}, {79,3245}, {80,943}, {140,1319}, {165,4299}, {392,1329}, {442,1145}, {484,4292}, {497,5818}, {516,3585}, {529,3916}, {611,3416}, {631,3476}, {908,3878}, {920,3421}, {944,3612}, {946,1512}, {952,2646}, {958,8069}, {1000,3090}, {1056,1788}, {1109,2292}, {1320,7504}, {1334,5179}, {1376,8071}, {1387,3628}, {1389,5559}, {1479,1697}, {1571,9597}, {1572,9596}, {1738,3987}, {1772,3670}, {1836,9654}, {1837,3295}, {2093,5290}, {2098,5886}, {2802,8068}, {3074,5255}, {3262,4357}, {3303,5722}, {3336,4298}, {3419,3913}, {3485,8164}, {3576,6961}, {3579,7354}, {3586,4309}, {3601,5881}, {3614,9955}, {3698,8728}, {3717,4710}, {3753,8256}, {3754,5249}, {3812,5570}, {3814,3884}, {3825,3898}, {3826,4002}, {3871,5086}, {3890,4193}, {3911,5445}, {3966,5827}, {4187,5123}, {4295,5261}, {4297,5010}, {4302,5691}, {4305,5281}, {4311,7280}, {4317,9588}, {4333,9778}, {4748,7961}, {4848,5902}, {4904,6706}, {5048,5901}, {5219,5761}, {5229,6361}, {5251,5795}, {5258,5745}, {5266,5724}, {5533,6702}, {5687,5794}, {5692,5837}, {5710,5725}, {5726,5758}, {5854,6668}, {6975,7741}, {6981,7962}, {7173,7743}, {7969,9646}, {7989,9614}, {8193,10037}, {9857,10038}</p>
<p>
X(10039) = complement of X(4861)<br>
X(10039) = midpoint of X(i),X(j) for these {i,j}: {3871,5086}<br>
X(10039) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6734,10)<br>
X(10039) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,10,1737), (1,1698,499), (8,3085,1), (10,6736,3679), (40,1478,1770), (40,9578,1478), (80,3746,950), (165,9613,4299), (388,5657,46), (442,1145,5836), (484,5270,4292), (495,5690,65), (944,5218,3612), (1056,1788,3338), (1697,5587,1479), (3295,5790,1837), (5445,5563,3911), (5697,7951,946), (5726,7991,9612), (7989,9819,9614), (9956,9957,11)<br>
